body.name: Real time leakage alert to prevent wastage of water
Remote shut-off button cuts off main line
Online bill generation depending upon usage and online degital payment option.
Impact league: Reward challenge to promote water saving and creating awareness
For any assistance on water supply or leakage issue plumber on demand can be avialed.
Easy to install can be easily mounted
E  Preinstalled long life battery to hold upto 8 yearss

head.heading: Usage
head.data: 1 A Serial Entreprenur and one of the core team member for developement of India's first Super Car DC Avanti.He has served as the Asst. V.P. for a Pune based startup Adclever.He has also been a public speaker and a motivator at platforms.He is an Alumni of UPES Dehradun.
